casebody.data:
Rosa WOODS, Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
Rosetta Hall, Plaintiff,
v.
RE INVESTMENT, INC., Defendant,
and
Citifinance, Inc., CitiMortgage, Inc., and Citi, Inc., Defendants-Appellees. SC: 158750
COA: 338139 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 16, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing her reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before February 20, 2019.
